mods.abstract: Performance of The Dark At The Top Of The Stairs, written by Tom Glazer, produced by Steve Sholes, recorded on August 5, 1958 at RCA Victor Studio in Manhattan, N.Y., and performed by Eddy Arnold (vocals), George Barnes (guitar), Al Casamenti (guitar), Lessberg (bass), Herbert Lovelle (drums), and Davie (piano). RCA master number J2WB-6119.
